# Full Stack C# Developer

https://way2.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0prk/ http://www.andrecarlucci.com/way2/we-are-looking-for-smart-d...

Our company is agile for real. We have dev teams that are open, creative and ship quality code. Our software enables energy companies to save resources, increase revenue and be better electricity providers. We push the world forward creating the software required for a smarter and greener grid.
